issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Shipping the following jars to LLAP to make jdbc storage-handler work: commons-dbcp, commons-pool, db specific jdbc jar whichever exists in classpath.
fields.summary: Shipping jdbd-storage-handler dependency jars in LLAP

ATTACHMENT ID: 12929282 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Hmm.. this was intended to be a constant list, and non-constant things like HBase are handled separately.
Perhaps instead of modifying the constant list it should add the classes in the actual code?
Also nit: the Class.for-add-catch block could be refactored into a method, it's repeated a few times.
